summary: Makes stats different when compared to normal Steel Armor.
descriptionHtml:
In Skyrim, there is two different variations of the Steel Armor, one with pauldrons and one without. Even though they have different models, their stats, even names, are identical. This patch will make changes to pauldron version of the armor.

+3 to armor defence (31>34)
+2 to weight (35>37)
+15 to the price (275>290)



Special thanks toÂ starfox246 for helping me with CK!
author: Afendor
